text.base: The wind is deafening up here. The ladder rungs are slick with ice, biting through your gloves. From the platform, Kaltvik is a smear of yellow light in a sea of black.

lens.believer: There is a pattern in the tree line. A spiral moving inwards towards the town. It's pulsing. The forest isn't growing; it's digesting.
lens.skeptic: Visibility is low, but you can see the fire road clearly. There's a car parked 2 miles down, half-buried in snow. Make: 1998 Volvo Sedan. Plate: KLT-429. That's... that's your car. The one you totaled ten years ago. It's pristine.
lens.haunted: You aren't climbing alone. You can feel the vibration on the rungs below you. Something is climbing *down* towards you. Don't look down.

board_updates.label: Phantom Vehicle
board_updates.description: You saw your own totaled car from ten years ago, pristine and parked on the fire road.
